SELECT p.id, p.name, p.description, p.price, p.stock, p.category_id, p.images, p.sales, p.status, p.create_time FROM products p
p.deleted = 0
AND p.category_id = #{categoryId}
AND (p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY p.sales DESC, p.create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE deleted = 0 AND status = 1 AND stock > 0 ORDER BY sales DESC, create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
